meta.title: PageMiner - Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
meta.description: PageMiner is a powerful browser extension that helps users quickly and accurately extract structured data from any webpage through visual operations. Supports multiple export formats, making data collection simple and efficient.
meta.keywords: web data extraction,data collection,web scraping,browser extension,data mining,automation tools

og.title: PageMiner - Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
og.description: Quickly extract web data through visual operations, supporting multiple export formats, making data collection simple and efficient.

twitter.title: PageMiner - Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
twitter.description: Quickly extract web data through visual operations, supporting multiple export formats, making data collection simple and efficient.

hero.title: Intelligent Web Data Extraction Assistant
hero.subtitle: Easily extract structured data from any web page through visual operations. No programming knowledge required, making data collection simple and efficient.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: PageMiner provides a complete web data extraction solution

visual.title: üéØ Visual Selection
visual.description: Directly select data elements on webpages through mouse hover and click operations

auto.description: Automatically execute data extraction on similar pages after configuration, greatly improving work efficiency

export.description: Support CSV, Excel, JSON and other formats, data can be directly used in analysis tools

storage.description: All data is saved locally by default, protecting your privacy and data security, supporting rule import and export

sync.title: ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud Sync
sync.description: Support cloud synchronization of rules and data, seamless collaboration across multiple devices

howItWorks.title: How to Use
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple three steps to start intelligent data extraction

step1.title: Select Elements
step1.description: Click to select data elements on the webpage that need to be extracted

step2.title: Configure Rules
step2.description: The system automatically generates extraction rules, which you can adjust as needed

step3.title: Extract Data
step3.description: One-click execution, automatically extract and export structured data

meta.description: Experience PageMiner's powerful features including visual data extraction, intelligent rule generation, automated execution and more.

og.title: PageMiner Feature Demo
og.description: Experience PageMiner's powerful features including visual data extraction, intelligent rule generation, automated execution and more.

demo.title: üöÄ PageMiner Feature Demo
demo.subtitle: Experience the powerful features of intelligent web data extraction and learn how to easily achieve data automation collection

coreFeatures.title: Core Feature Demo
coreFeatures.subtitle: Learn how PageMiner changes your data collection workflow

visual.title: üéØ Visual Selection
visual.description: Directly select data elements on webpages through mouse hover and click operations. The system automatically highlights selectable elements and generates unique CSS selectors.

smart.title: üß† Smart Rule Generation
smart.description: No need to manually write CSS selectors, PageMiner automatically analyzes page structure and generates precise extraction rules, supporting text, images, links and other data types.

auto.title: ‚ö° Auto Execution
auto.description: After configuration, the system automatically executes data extraction on similar pages without repeated operations, greatly improving work efficiency.

data.title: üìä Data Management
data.description: Extracted data is displayed in structured form, supporting multiple format exports for convenient subsequent analysis and processing.

interactive.title: Interactive Experience
interactive.subtitle: Personally experience PageMiner's data extraction process

showcase.title: Feature Showcase
showcase.subtitle: Deeply understand PageMiner's technical advantages and usage methods

recognition.title: üîç Smart Element Recognition
recognition.description: PageMiner can intelligently recognize list structures, table data, repeated elements and more in pages, automatically generating optimal extraction strategies. Supports multiple element type detection.

configuration.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Rule Configuration
configuration.description: Supports multiple selector types including CSS selectors, XPath, DOM paths, etc., meeting different scenario needs. Automatically generates unique selectors.

reuse.title: üîÑ Rule Reuse
reuse.description: Configure once, use everywhere. Supports rule import and export for more efficient team collaboration.

export.title: üìà Data Export
export.description: Supports CSV, Excel, JSON and other format exports, data can be directly used in analysis tools or databases.

pluginFeatures.title: Plugin Feature Showcase
pluginFeatures.subtitle: Core feature display based on actual code implementation

visualMode.title: üé® Visual Extraction Mode
visualMode.description: After starting extraction mode, hovering over page elements shows red border highlighting, clicking elements to select and configure extraction rules.

typeDetection.title: üîç Smart Type Detection
typeDetection.description: Automatically detect element types, intelligently recommend field types, supporting text, images, links and other data types.

progress.title: ‚ö° Real-time Extraction Progress
progress.description: Shows real-time progress during extraction, highlighting elements being extracted, providing visual feedback and status indication.

storage.title: üíæ Local Data Storage
storage.description: All extraction rules and data are saved locally by default, protecting user privacy, supporting rule import and export.

scenarios.title: Practical Application Scenarios
scenarios.subtitle: Understand PageMiner's application value in different industries

ecommerce.title: üõí E-commerce Operations
ecommerce.description: Monitor competitor prices, collect product information, analyze market trends, providing data support for product strategies.
ecommerce.applicable: Applicable: Price monitoring, competitor analysis, product research

research.title: üìä Market Research
research.description: Collect industry reports, statistical data, news and information, building complete research databases.
research.applicable: Applicable: Industry analysis, trend research, data collection

hr.title: üë• Human Resources
hr.description: Scrape recruitment information, candidate profiles, salary data, optimizing recruitment and talent management processes.
hr.applicable: Applicable: Recruitment information, talent analysis, market research

content.title: üì∞ Content Creation
content.description: Collect trending topics, user comments, trend data, providing inspiration and materials for content creation.
content.applicable: Applicable: Trend tracking, user insights, content planning
